com.googlecode.aluminumproject

Class Aluminum

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.Aluminum

  • public class Aluminum
extends Object
    The template engine.

    A template engine should be created once with a certain configuration. After that, the processTemplate method can be used repeatedly. A template engine that will no longer be used should be stopped.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Aluminum(Configuration configuration)
      Creates a template engine.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Processes a template.
      void stop()
      Stops this template engine.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Aluminum

        public Aluminum(Configuration configuration)
        Creates a template engine.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration to use

    • Method Detail

      • processTemplate

        public void processTemplate(String name,
                   String parser,
                   Context context,
                   Writer writer)
                     throws AluminumException
        Processes a template.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the template to process
        parser - the name of the parser to use
        context - the context to use
        writer - the writer to use (it will be closed after the template has been processed)
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the template can't be processed

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws AluminumException
        Stops this template engine.
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when this template engine can't be stopped
